name: PHAZACA
description:
PHAZACA is a top-down shooter where the screen grows and shrinks over time. It was made for Ludum Dare 42, where the theme was "Running out of Space".

Game design, programming, music, sound design, and visual design by @lycaontalks/@lycaon@dev.glitch.social.

Made using:

- Letterboxer by Ryan Nielson

- Super Text Mesh by KaiClavier

- InControl by Gallant Games

- m3x6 by managore
